name: webcams_list_exclude_webcamid_webcamid

webcamid.description: Comma-separated list of webcam IDs to exclude from the result. At least one webcam ID must be provided.

lang.description: Language code to localize the results, if available. Defaults to 'en'.

show.description: Content to be listed in the response. Possible values are: "webcams", "categories", "continents", "countries", "regions", "properties". Default is "webcams".
